title: Scurb Scurb Scurb! Scurb is the word!

embed.description: Just an introduction so you guys know what we're up to and what you can expect in the future! Social media! http://www.twitch.tv/scurbtv https://www.facebook.com/ScurbOfficial https://twitter.com/ScurbOfficial http://instagram.com/scurbofficial/

body:
Heeeyyyyy Guys.

Do you remember these animations? http://i.imgur.com/8EcMoZ1.png

Well now the guy who does them has has teamed up with me and we've launched a new YouTube channel! We've already got over 64,000 subs and we want to help boost the OCE scene and get all your awesome stuff seen.

So go check us out and let's make it big for OCE!

Scurbs out!
